name: tic-tac-toe
description: ## Description Tic-tac-toe is a paper-and-pencil game for two players who take turns marking the spaces in a three-by-three grid with X or O.  The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row first is the winner.  It is a solved game, with a forced draw assuming best play from both players. [Source from Wikipedia.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tic-tac-toe)
